Pre-Game Insights: Experts favor Bahrain to win based on their performance against Korea Selatan in the previous match.
Juan Antonio Pizzi, Bahrain's coach, emphasized the importance of maintaining consistency and focus throughout the match.
Others: The match will be broadcasted on iNews TV and Vision+ on January 20, 2024, at 21.30 WIB.
Bahrain and Malaysia failed to earn points in their first match of the group stage.
